speaker: agent
text: Ma' am, like this call is just to inform you that like today your Medicare is getting upgraded.

speaker: agent
text: So that's why you are getting some extra benefits from your Medicare at zero additional cost to you.

speaker: customer
text: Hope that sounds good to you, ma' am.

speaker: agent
text: Like, ma' am, the benefits you will be receiving after this, ma' am, you don't have to pay anything for your medications or prescriptions.

speaker: agent
text: You don't have to pay no co pays when you visit to your [OCCUPATION] or the [OCCUPATION].

speaker: customer
text: And ma' am, like you will receive some wide range of coverages like dental, vision, hearing, transportation services.

speaker: agent
text: And also ma' am, you will receive like $[MONEY_AMOUNT] money back to your Social Security check every month at zero additional cost.

speaker: agent
text: So ma' am, to get these benefits, I will just ask you two to three qualifying questions like is your Medicare part A and part B is active right now?

speaker: customer
text: And ma' am, for the confirmation you live in [LOCATION] [LOCATION], [LOCATION].

speaker: customer
text: And ma' am, can you please like confirm me?

speaker: agent
text: Do you make your own decisions about your Medicare?

speaker: agent
text: And ma' am, for the confirmation I have your full name with me.

speaker: agent
text: Okay, so ma' am, like you are qualified to get this extra benefits, ma' am.

speaker: agent
text: So right now what I will do, I will just like connect your call, ma' am, to the [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION].

speaker: agent
text: He will just going to verify some of the details.

speaker: agent
text: And after that, ma' am, I will just connect your call to the [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION] who is from your same area, ma' am, from the same zip code.

speaker: customer
text: He will just going to like explain you what are the benefits you are receiving.

speaker: agent
text: And he will just going to let you know, ma' am, when you will be receiving the paperwork about these benefits so you can read about the benefits as well.

speaker: agent
text: So ma' am, like before connecting your call for the confirmation, I have it address with me.

speaker: agent
text: Okay, and ma' am, can please like confirm what's your date of birth?

speaker: customer
text: Okay, so as I told you, it will take only [DURATION] [DURATION] to connect your call and the [OCCUPATION] will take like a minimum [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION] to explain everything and introduce you to them.

speaker: agent
text: So ma' am, just give me [DURATION] [DURATION].

speaker: customer
text: I have Ms. [PERSON_NAME] [PERSON_NAME] on the line with me.

speaker: agent
text: You may take over the call.

speaker: customer
